example[0]: Cook the sauce over a medium heat until it thickens. Meanwhile start boiling the water for the pasta.
definition[1]: in the period of time between two events
example[1]: The flight will be announced soon. Meanwhile, please remain seated.
example[2]: I knew I wouldn’t get my exam results for several weeks, and I wasn’t sure what to do in the meanwhile.
definition[2]: used to compare two things, especially if they are completely different and are happening at the same time
example[3]: The incomes of male professionals went up by almost 80%. Meanwhile, part-time women workers saw their earnings fall.
